org.deeplearning4j.nn.api

Interface Model

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Classifier, Layer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AutoEncoder, BarnesHutTsne, BaseLayer, BaseOutputLayer, BasePretrainNetwork, BaseRecurrentLayer, BatchNormalization, ConvolutionLayer, DenseLayer, GravesBidirectionalLSTM, GravesLSTM, GRU, ImageLSTM, LocalResponseNormalization, MultiLayerNetwork, OutputLayer, RBM, RecursiveAutoEncoder, RnnOutputLayer, RNTN, SubsamplingLayer

    public interface Model
    A Model is meant for predicting something from data. Note that this is not like supervised learning where there are labels attached to the examples.

      • accumulateScore

        void accumulateScore(double accum)
        Sets a rolling tally for the score. This is useful for mini batch learning when you are accumulating error across a dataset.
        Parameters:
        accum - the amount to accum

      • setParams

        void setParams(INDArray params)
        Set the parameters for this model. This expects a linear ndarray which then be unpacked internally relative to the expected ordering of the model
        Parameters:
        params - the parameters for the model

      • applyLearningRateScoreDecay

        void applyLearningRateScoreDecay()
        Update learningRate using for this model. Use the learningRateScoreBasedDecay to adapt the score if the Eps termination condition is met
